about.title: Who I am
about.text: I am a Full-Stack Developer with a solid foundation in programming, but always studying and updating to improve my skills every day. After having completed an intensive master's degree that enabled me to acquire most of my knowledge, I am now embarking on my first work experience in this field, where I try to improve my current skills, but also develop new ones. I consider myself an excellent worker, as I am also completely available for team-working. I am a perceptive person, even when faced with difficulties I try to overcome them as best I can, if there is a challenge I do not shy away from it.

dialog.title: Weather app
dialog.description: Application to check the weather around the world! Using ReactJS and Redux. Functionality: User should be able to select city and receive weather information (will it rain?, temperature?, next days?) Utilities: Open Weather API to build personal Weather site https://openweathermap.org/api

dialog.title: Benchmark clone
dialog.description: The main macro-tasks are: Creating the QUIZ functionality using JavaScript, DOM Manipulation and Events Creating the layout (UI) with HTML, CSS, Animations. The pages are: Welcome page, Question page, Results page, Feedback page.

dialog.title: Medium Clone
dialog.description: The project involves recreating the main page of medium.com in a desktop version, as faithfully as possible, using HTML, CSS, positioning, flexbox and animation techniques. Animation is planned on the navbar changing from yellow to white and the prinicpal button from black to green. This change is to occur just before the navbar exits the hero section area, the main yellow section. Create fade-in effect using some CSS Animation techniques.

dialog.title: Calculator in JS
dialog.description: The project aims to illustrate the development of a simple calculator using and integrating a series of functions that collect the value gathered from the selected field

cards.location: Casalnuovo of Naples, Campania, Italy · On site
cards.detail: During this experience, I contributed to the design and development of complex frontend applications with a focus on React and TypeScript. The main activities included:
cardContent: Development and maintenance of complex React systems for the management of customer/item configurations, technical, administrative and billing activities.
Complete refactor of a legacy application, breaking down logic, rendering and state into modular components, custom hooks and global context (loading, errors, etc.).
Implementation of an internal library of reusable components documented with Storybook and JSDoc, used in several company projects.
Implementation of a ticketing system with technical support flows and real-time management of device status (connected/disconnected).
Comprehensive testing using Jest, React Testing Library and Playwright, following a strategy of code coverage and maintainability.
Development of multilingual apps with React, PHP/MariaDB backend and automations in Node.js. API and versioning management with TortoiseSVN.
Drafting internal technical documentation on testing, documentation and adoption of TypeScript in React.

cards.location: Casalnuovo of Naples, Campania, Italy · On site
cards.detail: As part of a distributed international team, I actively participated in the development of full stack software solutions, collaborating with foreign colleagues on a daily basis and performing the following tasks:
cardContent: Frontend development with React, integrating MUI and custom components, and implementing REST API interaction logic via Axios.
Application of the main React paradigms: functional components, custom hooks and state management between components.
Partial contribution to backend development with Java + Spring Boot (microservices) and PostgreSQL database.
Creating automation scripts in Python to support repetitive tasks and data management.
This experience consolidated my skills in an international technical environment, improving my autonomy, communication and collaboration skills in distributed teams.

cards.detail: Intensive BootCamp for the Full-Stack Web Developer course lasting 6 months, totaling 950 training hours, divided into theory and daily hands-on projects, which were carried out both individually and in group work.
cardContent: Frontend: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Bootstrap, SASS, TypeScript.

cards.detail: DS1 Level 1 Postgraduate Diploma in Economics and Business Management, Business Administration and Management, General
